alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Steele; Traill; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 6:55AM CDT until July 10 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... Nelson County in northeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... Western Traill County in southeastern North Dakota... Griggs County in southeastern North Dakota... Eastern Ramsey County in northeastern North Dakota... Northeastern Barnes County in southeastern North Dakota... Southwestern Walsh County in northeastern North Dakota... Steele County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 655 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Edmore to 6 miles north of Pekin to Revere, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... McVille around 700 AM CDT. Hannaford and Walum around 705 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Adams, Luverne, Sibley, Logan Center, Blabon, Lankin and Pillsbury. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Cass; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Steele; Traill; Walsh
